shipping_fee_nonsupplier.label: Shipping cost for non supplier products:

shipping_hide_tablerate.label: Hide Standard Store Table Rate
shipping_hide_tablerate.comment: To avoid by duplicate this method

default_shipping_fee.label: Shipping cost amount for non supplier products

default_shipping_fee_not_set_supplier.label: Default shipping cost if supplier does not set shipping prices

minimum_suppler_shipping_price.label: Minimum price for supplier shipped products

notify_admin_on_profile_changed.label: Notify when supplier changed his profile

notify_supplier_on_profile_approved.label: Notify supplier when his profile was approved

is_discount_effective.label: Is discount effective
is_discount_effective.comment: If set to "No" suppliers commissions will be calculated ignoring discount

check_profile_fully.label: Restrict vendor portal unless profile is not fully filled up
check_profile_fully.comment: If set to "Yes" suppliers need complete profile informations before start use vendor portal.

show_cart_notice.label: Show notice on cart page if customer have products from multiple vendors

sold_by.label: Add 'Sold by' option on product page

change_shipping_costs.label: Allow supplier to manage shipping costs

allow_to_send_shipment.label: Allow to send emails to customers if supplier create a shipment

allow_to_send_invoice.label: Allow to send emails to customers if supplier create a invoice

set_default_order_status.label: Set default order status when vendor create shipment

change_order_status_if_completed.label: Change state of order when vendor create shipment

show_billing_address.label: Show billing address
show_billing_address.comment: In order CSV export show customer billing address

show_payment_information.label: Show payment information
show_payment_information.comment: In order CSV export show payment information. Note that only payment method name will be shown

show_gift_message.label: Show gift message
show_gift_message.comment: In order CSV export show gift message information

amount_calculation.label: Calculate Vendor Amount Based on Prices:

can_change_order_status.label: Suppliers can change order status
can_change_order_status.comment: Define if vendors can change status of the order in Order Management in Vendor Portal

available_order_statuses.label: Available statuses to change
available_order_statuses.comment: Select statuses that will be available for a vendor

can_show_payment_info.label: Show payment information
can_show_payment_info.comment: Determines if vendor can see payment info in order detail page in his dashboard

can_show_shipping_info.label: Show shipping information
can_show_shipping_info.comment: Determines if vendor can see shipping info in order detail page in his dashboard

page_height.label: Page Height
page_height.comment: In inches, without any metric symbol. For eg. 8.7

page_width.label: Page Width
page_width.comment: In inches, without any metric symbol. For eg. 6.6

width.label: Label Width
width.comment: In inches, without any metric symbol. For eg. 2.95

height.label: Label Height
height.comment: In inches, without any metric symbol. For eg. 2

vertical_pitch.label: Vertical pitch
vertical_pitch.comment: In inches, without any metric symbol. For eg. 2.2

horizontal_pitch.comment: In inches, without any metric symbol. For eg. 3.2

top_margin.label: Top margin
